entry.title: [GRA][Webhosting] - Cluster 003
entry.content:
Jan 31, 13:22 UTC
Resolved - End time : 31/01/2022 07:21 UTC
Service status: The regeneration of the statistics was successful.
The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a hardware.

Jan 24, 14:46 UTC
Update - Our teams are currently removing some load from the cluster003, in order to be able to continue the regeneration of the statistics.

Jan 2, 09:07 UTC
Update - The regeneration of the statistics is completed but our teams found some missing statistics from 31/10/2022 to 06/11/2022 and they are currently working on regenerating them.

Dec 26, 10:00 UTC
Update - The regeneration of the statistics is still in progress and is 95% completed.

Dec 19, 09:52 UTC
Update - The regeneration of the statistics is still in progress and is 89% completed.

Dec 12, 14:01 UTC
Update - The regeneration of the statistics is still in progress and is 72% completed.

Dec 5, 13:43 UTC
Update - The regeneration of the statistics from May to November is still in progress and is 64% completed.

Nov 21, 10:47 UTC
Update - The generation of the current statistics (owstats) is still temporarily frozen.
The regeneration of the past statistics (oct/nov/dec 2021) is completed.

Oct 31, 15:40 UTC
Update - The generation of the current statistics (owstats) is still temporarily frozen.
The regeneration of the past statistics (oct/nov/dec 2021) is 90% completed.

Oct 25, 12:41 UTC
Update - The generation of the current statistics is temporarily frozen.

Oct 24, 08:17 UTC
Update - Our teams are still working on Cluster003. The migration is still in progress.

Sep 26, 08:47 UTC
Update - Update: The migration is still in progress.

Aug 30, 12:07 UTC
Update - The migration is still in progress.

Aug 18, 13:17 UTC
Update - The migration is still in progress.
Statistics are available again and logs are accessible.

Aug 8, 15:24 UTC
Update - The migration is still in progress. Statistics are temporarily unavailable on Cluster003 since 23/07/2022 01:45 UTC, but logs are accessible.

Jul 26, 10:02 UTC
Update - The migration is still in progress. Logs are accessible but, statistics are temporarily unavailable on Cluster003 since 23/07/2022 01:45 UTC.

Jul 23, 13:33 UTC
Update - Logs and statistics are temporary unavailable on Cluster 003 since 23/07/2022 01:45 UTC.

Jul 22, 15:03 UTC
Update - The migration is still in progress.

Jul 15, 12:45 UTC
Update - The migration is still in progress.

Jul 11, 13:51 UTC
Update - The migration is still in progress.

Jul 4, 09:43 UTC
Update - Migration is still ongoing.

Jun 13, 09:44 UTC
Update - The migration of the cluster is still in progress. We will come back to you when the migration is completed.

Jun 6, 08:55 UTC
Update - Update:Our teams are in the process of migrating the data to a different filerz which takes time.
That's why the regeneration of statistics is suspended.
We will come back to you when the migration is completed.

May 20, 13:39 UTC
Update - Update: There are ongoing maintenance tasks that prevent the regeneration of statistics.
The regeneration of statistics will normally take place mid-next week.

May 13, 17:16 UTC
Update - The regeneration of stats is still on its way.
We will post update when significant progress has been made.

May 6, 15:18 UTC
Update - Update: The regeneration of stats is still on going. 38% have been done.

Apr 25, 08:40 UTC
Update - Update:We are restarting the last generation for the rest of customer.

Apr 15, 08:41 UTC
Update - Update : There are ongoing maintenance tasks that prevent the regeneration of statistics. We will come back to you to keep you informed.

Mar 25, 10:38 UTC
Update - Update:Regeneration is currently suspended, blocked at 65%.
The generation of the statistics of the day before is still functional however

Mar 23, 11:25 UTC
Update - Update: The daily regeneration is still in progress.

Mar 14, 10:37 UTC
Update - Update: Actually we have 50% generated.

Mar 14, 10:35 UTC
Update - Update:There are 200 sites left to generate to reach 50%.

Mar 11, 13:25 UTC
Update - Update: Our teams will finish generating 50% on the 13/03/2022.
We will keep you informed of the progress.

Mar 7, 15:31 UTC
Update - Update:We are starting the last generation for 50% of customer, Actually we have 45% generated.

Feb 25, 14:17 UTC
Update - Update: We are continuing to generate statistics. We will have finished 50% normally end of next week

Feb 23, 12:16 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Feb 21, 10:35 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Statistics generation is still in progress . You will be informed of the progress.

Feb 14, 13:46 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Patch have been deployed. We relaunch statistics generation . You will be informed of the progress.

Feb 1, 11:04 UTC
Update - Update :Our technical teams have detected a problem during the regeneration of statistics, we are currently creating a patch to correct the problem.

Jan 31, 12:05 UTC
Update - Update: Our technical teams have detected a bug making the display of the statuses invisible on a date period higher than 1 month. They are investigating to determine the origin

Jan 24, 10:53 UTC
Update - Update: Our teams are working on regenerating the metrics.

30/09/2021 to 11/10/2021 : Metrics regeneration is complete
30/11/2021 to 13/12/2021 : Reconstructed metrics in progress
12/01/2022 to 15/01/2022 : Metrics will be generated shortly.
24/01/2022 to 07/02/2022 : Metrics are curently regenerating

Jan 21, 14:00 UTC
Update - Update: Our teams are working on regenerating the metrics.

30/09/2021 to 11/10/2021 : Metrics regeneration is complete
30/11/2021 to 13/12/2021 : Reconstructed metrics in progress
12/01/2022 to 15/01/2022 : Metrics will be generated shortly.

Jan 19, 12:26 UTC
Update - Update: Our teams are working on regenerating the metrics.

30/09/2021 to 11/10/2021 : Metrics finishes being regenerated during the day
30/11/2021 to 13/12/2021 : Reconstructed metrics started
12/01/2022 to 15/01/2022 : Metrics will be generated shortly.

Jan 18, 09:31 UTC
Update - Update: Our teams are working on regenerating the metrics.

30/10/2021 to 16/11/2021 metrics are re-generated.
30/09/2021 to 11/10/2021 metrics are 50% done.
12/01/2022 to 15/01/2022 and 30/11/2021 to 13/12/2021 metrics will be generated shortly.

Jan 14, 12:00 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions :Following some slowness on the filerz, we had to cancel the regeneration spots.
They were relaunched this morning but with a smaller gap in stats to regenerate
Next update : 17/01/2022

Jan 12, 10:52 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : The reconstruction of the statistics takes longer than estimated.
36% of the statistics are rebuilt since last Friday
Next update max : 17/01/2022

Jan 10, 08:52 UTC
Identified - Ongoing actions : The reconstruction of the statistics takes longer than estimated.
Today 25% of the statistics are rebuilt since last Friday
Next update : 17/01/2022

Jan 7, 11:13 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/01/2022
Service impact : some statistiques between september and december are missing
Ongoing actions : We relaunch all statistics generation, this action can take all week-end
